PerfectNetExp.abs: bouflers 布夫莱尔, bougainville 布甘维尔, bougai 布盖

list.abs: ...条纹袋狸（Perameles bougainville），又名带袋狸或纹袋狸，是澳洲一种细小的袋狸。它们曾一度由西澳州横跨澳洲南部分布至新南威尔士中部，但现已只限于西澳州鲨鱼弯的伯尼尔岛、Dorre岛及Faure岛。cite book.

means.word_mean: 1. French explorer who circumnavigated the globe accompanied by scientists (1729-1811)
2. the largest of the Solomon Islands; a province of Papua New Guinea
